dcterms:description: The CGED 2020 dataset is comprised of foreign Chinese learnersâ€™ writing and contains an additional error type, reversed order, which is less frequent in native Chinese writing. The dataset was modified to remove samples with this error for the experiments.
dcterms:title: CGED 2020

dcterms:creator: Yuen-Hsien Tseng

dcterms:description: The SIGHAN 2015 dataset contains text-aligned data for Chinese spelling check, used in the experiments to evaluate the model's performance on mistaken character errors.
dcterms:title: SIGHAN 2015

dcterms:description: The SIGHAN-synthesize dataset is a synthesized dataset based on SIGHAN 2015, created to include non-aligned data for testing the model's effectiveness on various error types.
dcterms:title: SIGHAN-synthesize
